author: John Timmer
title: New model looks at what might happen if SARS-CoV-2 is here to stay
description: If it's like related viruses, it could cause seasonal outbreaks for years.
content:
Enlarge/ Face masks may be a regular feature in our near-term future.
9 with 9 posters participating
Most of the optimistic ideas about what to do about SARS-CoV-2 involve engineering the virus' extinction. We could ramp up testing and isolate anyone who's … [+7683 chars]
